get.description: Gets the list of Microsoft.Compute SKUs available for your Subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

apiVersions.description: The api versions that support this SKU.

capabilities.description: A name value pair to describe the capability.

family.description: The Family of this particular SKU.

kind.description: The Kind of resources that are supported in this SKU.

locationInfo.description: A list of locations and availability zones in those locations where the SKU is available.

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available.

resourceType.description: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

restrictions.description: The restrictions because of which SKU cannot be used. This is empty if there are no restrictions.

tier.description:
Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set.

Possible Values:

**Standard**

**Basic**

name.description: An invariant to describe the feature.

value.description: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

maximum.description: The maximum capacity that can be set.

scaleType.description: The scale type applicable to the sku.

ResourceSkuCapacity.description: Describes scaling information of a SKU.

extendedUnit.description: An invariant to show the extended unit.

meterID.description: Used for querying price from commerce.

quantity.description: The multiplier is needed to extend the base metered cost.

ResourceSkuCosts.description: Describes metadata for retrieving price info.

zoneDetails.description: Details of capabilities available to a SKU in specific zones.

zones.description: List of availability zones where the SKU is supported.

locations.description: Locations where the SKU is restricted

zones.description: List of availability zones where the SKU is restricted.

values.description: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location. This would be different locations where the SKU is restricted.

ResourceSkuRestrictions.description: Describes scaling information of a SKU.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities that are available for the SKU in the specified list of zones.

name.description: The set of zones that the SKU is available in with the specified capabilities.

ResourceSkuZoneDetails.description: Describes The zonal capabilities of a SKU.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of Resource Skus. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of Resource Skus

value.description: The list of skus available for the subscription.

ResourceSkusResult.description: The List Resource Skus operation response.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
